name: Origins: A Chinese New Year Quest
name_original: Origins: A Chinese New Year Quest
description:
It's Chinese New Year! Your town is ready to start a celebration, but they are unable to do anything without having the zodiac animal relics in place. After a clumsy villager has misplaced the relics, you are tasked with finding the scattered items throughout town. Along the way, you learn quite a bit about the origins of each zodiac animal.

This game is brought to you by Global Game Jam 2023
